name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with over 10 years of experience in crafting high-performance software solutions, primarily using **Java**, **Maven**, and **Vaadin**. Demonstrated expertise in database management with **MySQL**, **SQL Server**, and **PL/SQL**, alongside a solid understanding of messaging systems like **ActiveMQ** and **RabbitMQ**. Proven ability in developing robust REST and SOAP services, ensuring seamless communication across distributed systems. Skilled in cloud technologies and containerization with **Docker**, enabling efficient deployment and scalability of applications. 
In addition to core Java expertise, equipped with hands-on experience in modern frameworks such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and mobile development using **Flutter**. Successfully led the design and implementation of secure, maintainable architectures while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about leveraging technology to drive impactful solutions, with a strong emphasis on enhancing system performance and operational efficiency.
